title: Pseudepigrapha Railgun
alternative_title: Niseten Railgun ; 偽典・超電磁砲
status: Niseten Railgun ; 偽典・超電磁砲
description:
Description :
        A collection of artwork by several artists, 4-komas, omakes, and fanfiction stories of the Toaru Majutsu no Index universe.
Original released as a bonus special edition of the release of the 5th manga volume of Toaru Kagaku no Railgun.
